recommendations: Sapna Sukumar (She/Her) ‚ÄúI rarely come across real talents who stand out like Arun and he is a wonderful guy to work with. Had the pleasure of working with him for 2+ years and collaborating together on several hiring requirements across Ops, Marketing, Finance, Revenue & Growth, Labs and other Non-IT roles. Arun's ability to handle multiple roles across different BU's was unlike any I‚Äôve seen before. Ownership and solid work ethics is what could define Arun at work. He would work very closely with the hiring manager and businesses to understand the need than just simply putting forward people for discussions. his interview to offer ratio should be appx 1:3 which means hiring manager's will not have to invest time on too many discussions. No matter how tough the hiring manager was, how niche the profile required was and how tense a meeting, Arun made sure everyone left convincingly and with a smile. I will Arun all the best.. ‚Äù
